name: Twirling firy monsters
description:
Burn the opposing trainers and become the very best like no one ever was. If that sounds like fun to you.

Fire monster : burns plants, unable to move far-off but can defeat trainers
Plant monster : grows on water, can move in straight lines and leave a trail of plants behind itself
Water monster : extinguishes fire, can move diagonally and splashes water around itself

Click to select and move a character on the board !
Click on a free tile to cancel a movement.
Different creatures move differently and have different powers.

(Proudly) made in 48 hours for the Gmtk Game Jam 2020 by FeuilleMorte Entertainment.


You can check out some other games here!

Artist/composer : Elias Chraïbi
Composer/sound designer : Timou
Game designer/programmer : Maxence Maire
